name: Get The Kids Working - One Hour Game Jam
name_original: Get The Kids Working - One Hour Game Jam
description:
This was created for the one hour game jam, week 16 of 2017. Art was created using Kenney Studio.

You are a teacher who is trying to keep his students working. Students can be working (represented by a spanner icon), confused (represented by a question mark icon), bored (represented by a cloud icon) or misbehaving (represented by an exclamation icon) .

Push 1 to explain to a confused student.

Push 2 to inspire a bored student.

Push 3 to discipline a misbehaving student.

I had planned to add a scoring system, and a system where you could lose the game (by responding incorrectly or not responding quickly enough) but I ran out of time way faster than I anticipated.
